name: Shimmin Design
description:
Shimmin Design is a small company offering world-class identity design & branding. We create, expand, evolve, and strengthen the identities of small and medium-sized businesses.
Whether you’re just launching your company or new product, or you’ve been in business for years and need to take your company’s identity to the next level, we can help. We love a new challenge, so whatever your industry, we’re happy to work with you.
